title: build: Failure/Error when building Go 1.3 from source on Debian Testing
body:
by **ondekoza**: 
I tried to build the latest release go1.3.src.tar.gz (MD5: 4b66d72...)
on Debian Testing in a VirtualBox.
(Linux debian 3.14-1-486 #1 Debian 3.14.7-1 (2014-06-16) i686 GNU/Linux)

When I do 
cd go/src/; ./all.bash

The build fails with:

[...]
.../go/misc/cgo/test(.text): unexpected GOT reloc for non-dynamic symbol 
_cgoexp_b4c3633d7731_exportint64
too many errors
FAIL _home/stefan/go/misc/go/test [build failed]

Not only int64 is affected; the same error occurs for uint32, int32, uint16, int16 etc
